ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnCMD_SELECIONAR_TOTALExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_RECEBIMENTOFISICOPAI")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLERFP", item.Handle)

def OnCMD_SELECIONAR_PARCIALExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_RECEBIMENTOFISICOPAI")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLERFP", item.Handle)
